meanings.definition: External genital organs of a human, especially those of a woman.
meanings.sent1: She learned about the pudendum in her biology class.
meanings.sent2: The doctor examined her pudendum during the check-up.
meanings.sent3: The artist painted a beautiful picture of the pudendum.
meanings.sent4: Her pudendum was like a delicate flower in the garden of her body.
meanings.sent5: The pudendum is an important part of the female anatomy.

meanings.definition: The external genital organs of a human, especially those of a woman, viewed as a source of sexual pleasure.
meanings.sent1: She blushed when her partner touched her pudendum.
meanings.sent2: The pudendum is a sensitive area that requires gentle care.
meanings.sent3: The comedian joked about the pudendum in a lighthearted manner.
meanings.sent4: Her pudendum was a treasure trove of pleasure waiting to be explored.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the pudendum can lead to intimate connections.
